Question: On November 6, 2008, this person performed the song with Madonna on the Los Angeles stop of her Sticky & Sweet Tour.
Hints: The deal with McDonald's earned this person an estimated $6 million.
Band member Lance Bass was openly critical of this person's actions in his memoir Out of Sync.
The song "Give It to Me", a Timbaland single on which this person guests with Nelly Furtado, reached the Hot 100 number-one spot.
